headline: Union Pacific Valuation in Focus After Trump Backs $72B Norfolk Southern Merger
summary: If you have been watching Union Pacific lately, you are probably wondering whether now is the right time to get on board or if this train has already left the station. Over the last month, Union Pacific's stock has climbed an impressive 7.8%. Over the past week, the stock ticked up another 0.5%, hinting at growing optimism from investors. In the grander scheme, its one-year return sits at just 2.6%, with the past three years showing a steadier 31.3% rise. Even across five years, Union Pacific...
